title: Android Weekly Issue #658
description: Articles & Tutorials Sponsored Genius Scan SDK: a document scanner in your app Embed a reliable document scanner with OCR in your app, enabling your customers to capture high-quality, legible documents that you can process effortlessly. Hundreds of companies and millions of users trust the Genius Scan technology. Supports Android, iOS, and cross-platform frameworks. Using new Camera extensions API by Victor Brandalise Victor Brandalise explores the new Camera Extensions API, highlighting its support for advanced features like Night and Bokeh modes through Camera2 and CameraX. Collection Processing Guessing Game! Marcin Moskala tests your understanding of Kotlin collection processing. Widgets with Glance: Displaying images Katie Barnett explains how to incorporate images into Android widgets using Jetpack Glance, while ensuring efficient background image loading and proper state handling. Jetpack Compose and Edge-to-Edge on Android 15 Dobri Kostadinov looks at how Android 15’s edge-to-edge feature impacts Jetpack Compose development. Performance Class helps Google Maps deliver premium experiences Nevin Mital takes a look at how Google Maps was able to tailor a feature launch to best fit each device with Media Performance Class. Apps adopt Transformer to support more performant media editing Caren Chang discusses how the Jetpack Media3 library’s Transformer module offers reliable and high-performance APIs for media transcoding and editing, enabling operations like trimming, applying video effects, and format conversion. Kotlin Design Patterns - Part 3 In this third installment, Ignacio Carrión covers Memento, Command, Visitor, Chain of Responsibility, and Mediator patterns. Using SVGs on Canvas with Compose Multiplatform Eevis Panula demonstrates how to convert SVG images into paths for use in Compose’s Canvas, providing flexibility in rendering vector graphics across Compose Multiplatform. Running Specific Android UI Tests using TestParameterInjector via a Regex Sam Edwards sheds light on the relatively uncommon tests_regex instrumentation argument, which allows tests to be run based on a regular expression. The Power of SKIE Subplugins Tadeas Kriz shows how to generate Swift code for your Kotlin Multiplatform project using SKIE subplugins. Place a sponsored post Advertise your Android dev course to over 80k readers Libraries & Code Jetpack-Compose-preview-creator An Android Studio plugin to quickly create jetpack compose preview functions lumo-ui A Gradle plugin for generating Compose UI components through a CLI. It provides customizable and ready-to-use components that you can copy-paste into your projects. News Android Studio Ladybug Feature Drop is Stable! Read on to learn more about all the updates, quality improvements, and new features across your key workflows in Android Studio Ladybug Feature Drop. Android Developers Blog: Media3 1.5.0 — what’s new? Kristina Simakova announces the release of Media3 1.5.0, introducing features such as motion photo support in Transformer, faster image encoding, a new IAMF decoder, and much more! Videos & Podcasts KotlinPoet with Egor Andreevich Nicola Corti interviews Egor Andreevich about KotlinPoet, a library developed by Square for generating Kotlin code. Functional Programming in Kotlin for Android Developers Delve into the world of functional programming and its applications in Kotlin. Challenges of opportunities of operating live games (Playtime 2024) An engaging conversation with prominent game partners about the current obstacles their businesses are facing across acquisition, engagement, monetization and market expansion. Top 5 Updates From Firebase for December 2024 December 2024: New App Hosting Emulator, AI Monitoring preview, Flutter support for SPM, and more! 5 Things You MUST Do Before Deploying Your App to Google Play Philipp Lackner teaches about 5 things you should definitely not forget about before deploying your app to Google Play. What are all of those Kotlin function types for? Dave Leeds looks at the surprising number of function types in Kotlin and what they are used for. Exploring Podcast RSS Feeds with Lamberto Basti! In this episode, explore the fascinating world of podcast RSS feeds with Lamberto Basti Compose Performance for Us Humans — Live with Tomáš Mlynarič! Coding with the Italians goes live with Tomáš Mlynarič to learn about Compose performance. Specials Follow us on BlueSky We're there as well!
text: Embed a reliable document scanner with OCR in your app, enabling your customers to capture high-quality, legible documents that you can process effortlessly. Hundreds of companies and millions of users trust the Genius Scan technology. Supports Android, iOS, and cross-platform frameworks. Katie Barnett explains how to incorporate images into Android widgets using Jetpack Glance, while ensuring efficient background image loading and proper state handling. In this third installment, Ignacio Carrión covers Memento, Command, Visitor, Chain of Responsibility, and Mediator patterns. A Gradle plugin for generating Compose UI components through a CLI. It provides customizable and ready-to-use components that you can copy-paste into your projects. ]]>
html:
Embed a reliable document scanner with OCR in your app, enabling your customers to capture high-quality, legible documents that you can process effortlessly. Hundreds of companies and millions of users trust the Genius Scan technology. Supports Android, iOS, and cross-platform frameworks.

Katie Barnett explains how to incorporate images into Android widgets using Jetpack Glance, while ensuring efficient background image loading and proper state handling.

In this third installment, Ignacio Carrión covers Memento, Command, Visitor, Chain of Responsibility, and Mediator patterns.

A Gradle plugin for generating Compose UI components through a CLI. It provides customizable and ready-to-use components that you can copy-paste into your projects.

]]>
